articles.title: United Arab Emirates (Head Office)
articles.excerpt: Dubai serves as PAG's head office and strategic coordination point for cross-border business development.

articles.title: Djibouti
articles.excerpt: Djibouti supports PAG's regional access and coordination across East Africa trade and mobility corridors.

articles.title: Ethiopia
articles.excerpt: PAG maintains office presence in Ethiopia to support local coordination and partner engagement.

articles.title: East Africa & Gulf Trade Corridors
articles.excerpt: PAG operates across the East Africa and Gulf corridor, linking international partners with regional institutions and local operators.
